comment.text: Extremely good sushi. They have a wide variety of unique rolls and all are made with good and fresh ingredients. Only downside is the prices are pretty high, I got two sushi rolls and it cost about $28.

owner_replies.comment:
Hi Abby,
We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us this note. We values put customer satisfaction as top priority and we are committed to our customers. Its customers like you that make our restaurant more wonderful. We look forward to serving you again.

comment.text: Excellent sushi as well as vegetarian and vegan options. All of their food is super fresh, and they pay very close attention to detail.  Excellent service as well, and the portions are big.  Great atmosphere.   I can't wait until they open their new location in Midtown.

This is a dream oriental dining location in buckhead ga.,
 Great sushi and perfectly cook food. Favor and serviice great!

It's hard to find decent sushi in Atlanta, and especially hard to find great sushi without breaking your bank. Nova is consistent and excellent! My husband and I order for pick-up and here now as our place to get sushi in Buckhead. 

My only suggestion is that I've noticed the prices are different on the delivery apps than on the pick-up menu. We live .7 miles away, so it's usually just easier to pick up, but I wish the delivery prices on apps like UberEats, Postmates, etc weren't $2-$3 higher + the additional fees. 

For the food, we are consistent around getting 2 special rolls, 1 regular roll and an app and soup. That's what we like. 

Super Crunchy Roll
Nova Roll
Beauty and the Beast Roll
All great!

owner_replies.comment:
Hello Leah,
Thank you for your lovely note. I really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience at Nova Sushi here in Atlanta!

comment.text: Super fresh  sushi. Tried the spicy yellowtail with brown rice & cucumber instead of white rice. The coconut soup was very good (could've done without the chicken in it though). Also, the spicy garlic edamame was delish (got the sauce on the side). My friend and I were very pleased. It was our first time here. We sat at the bar and the sushi chefs were so sweet. I asked them for extra ginger and they gave me an entire saucer full of it (which I ended up eating the entire thing). Will definitely visit again! ...there was a wait when we walked in so must be a super poppin place!

I dined here with a couple of friends and the sushi was amazing. My friend and I split the Volcano roll and the Surf and Turf roll. Both of the rolls had shrimp tempura inside. They were both absolutely delicious and refreshing, but I loved the Surf and Turf more. There was a thinly sliced layer of filet mignon on top and that really made the difference. It was so good!! The slivered green onions were a perfect addition and really enhanced the overall flavor of the roll. I definitely recommend Nova Sushi! A bit pricey, but it is in buckhead, a block away from Phipps plaza, so what do you expect lol. Worth it!
Consistent , delicious food . Even though dining in isn't an option at this time it doesn't even matter. To go or dining in pre-Covid , My Sushi go to every time !

Very nice portions. Enough where you can order one item & be okay. I've been to places where you technically have to order to items in order to walk away satisfied. Here? Not an issue with portions. And it's good. Nice drink selection as well.
Everything was ok. Service was friendly but rare. Sushi was acceptable but not great by any means. Would go to again if it was super convenient but wouldn't go out of my way to stop by.

My usual go-to spot for some Asian food as I moved her from NY so finding good Asian spots was pretty hard but luckily this one is walking distance from me and the food is good. They offer lunch and dinner portions but all very filling either way. I love the garlic shrimp and broccoli plate but they offer bento boxes which I also love and chicken lettuce wraps. My boyfriend gets the Mongolian beef meal and loves it every time. Would recommend for some quick delicious meal!

The first time I went here I thought it would be my go-to sushi spot since I live down the street. Since then I've noticed it's inconsistent in terms of quality and service. Don't get me wrong, love this place, but depends what time and day you're going! Would def recommend lettuce wraps.
This is some deliciously yummy food!!! I went with a group not too long ago and I was anxiously awaiting my next trip! I will definitely recommend to all my close ones what a hit this place is!
This place has great service and delicious food. When I visited, had a couple different sushis and fried rice. Friendly staff and prompt service. Will be back!

Nova is our favorite sushi spot in Atlanta. The fish is always fresh and the sushi rolls available are really tasty and creative. The hot food is also really good if you are in the mood for a rice or noodle dish. The staff is friendly and food does not take too long to prepare. A lot of sushi places have really sour tasting rice due to the vinegar used (nothing wrong with this but I personally don't like that sour aftertaste) , but I found that Nova's sushi does not have that sour aftertaste at all. The sushi "pizza" is delicious and any of the rolls are great too - you can't go wrong. The Thai Basil Fried Rice is also super delicious. Easily one of our favorite restaurants in the area due to their reliability and great tasting food.
Excellent service and social distancing/mask wearing is required to enter the establishment. Lots of sushi options and delicious fried wontons.
We had the best take out from here! Chicken fried rice and broccoli plate with spicy garlic sauce was amazing! We will definitely be ordering again!

Who knew this hidden gem was right down the street! The food is amazing and the price cannot be beat, delicious food at an inexpensive price in Buckhead is a win all around.

I had the seafood combination entree and it was so much food! Came with lobster, shrimp, scallops, sautéed vegetables and rice for only $22 and the plate was huge. The cocktails are great as well.

Parking is easy and free and there is ample booth seating and seats at the bar as well.

owner_replies.comment: Thanks for taking the time to share your experience at Nova Sushi. We take pride in giving outstanding food to all customers, and we're overjoyed to receive your compliments and appreciation. We hope to see you here again and please bring all your friends and family. We will ensure they all enjoy the same quality of food as you have.

comment.text: Food was excellent. Sushi rolls were massive and great flavors. Just a heads up the chefs sauce on the rolls is pretty spicy, well it was for me. Service was great also.

My family ordered our meals through DoorDash and we were not disappointed with the position size of the lo main and teriyaki chicken, the sushi was amazing but I highly recommend to eat at the restaurant. Sushi is so much better when you eat it fresh and right away. The customer service at this restaurant was amazing and I appreciate how sweet the person who answered the phone was. I highly recommend the caterpillar roll! Yum!

This place was recommended to me by my roommate who is a regular and so glad he did. I have only lived in Atlanta for a few weeks but i have got to say it did not disappoint. The wait staff and guys behind the bar making the rolls and sashimi were very friendly and accommodating. Place is also very casual and don't feel pressured if you are going in alone to enjoy sushi on your own. 

Very friendly place and they also have a tv to watch any game you'd like. I highly recommend this place whether it's with a group or if you're going solo like i did. Their rolls and sashimi were great and if you like regular rolls they have an amazing 3 for $18 deal that is out of this world. 

I will definitely be going back and try to become a regular there. My goal in the end i want to try all of their rolls and entrees. Look forward to m next visit.

owner_replies.comment:
Hi Ace,
We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us this note. We values put customer satisfaction as top priority and we are committed to our customers. Its customers like you that make our restaurant more wonderful. We look forward to serving you again.

comment.text:
I frequent Nova for lunch as I work across the street. I'm a huge fan of their sushi but I dock my 1 point as I wasn't as impressed by their noodle or meat dishes.

Their sushi has always come out decorated beautifully with faux flowers and leaves or intricate large plates. The traditional maki rolls like Spicy Tuna, Salmon, etc are always flavorful and fresh. I've only tried 2 specialty rolls - but both have been delicious and beautiful as well. The prices are very comparable, if not more affordable than nearby sushi places (Tomo, UMI) but the quality is much higher than other low-cost sushi places (RuSan's, Maki Fresh). To me, Nova is the perfect medium that lets me get a great roll combo at a decent price.

I've also tried their pad thai which was too greasy and saucy for me as there was red oil running off the flat noodles. I am a fan of their Hot & Sour Soup even though it has tomatoes and white mushrooms in it instead of the traditional bamboo shoots and woodear mushrooms. 

For dessert, I highly recommend the Tempura Fried green tea ice cream. It's a good portion and the tempura batter is delicious on the cold milky matcha ice cream.

Service has always been decent. Nothing over the top but I wouldn't define Nova as fine-dining. It's just my go-to spot for quality sushi!

owner_replies.comment: Thank you for your kind words. It's always a pleasure to see you. We are looking forward to your next visit.

comment.text: Very okay. Nothing special. Prices were reasonable but my tofu fried rice had chunks of salt in it. Do NOT get the coconut soup, it was a waste of money and nothing like real coconut soup. Disappointing.

Very average.  Spider roll, salmon roll and eel roll were good. Spicy tuna roll was subpar.  Wasabi flavorless.  Side salad is nothing but iceberg lettuce and the ginger dressing weak.  Hot and sour soup bland.  General Tso's chicken terrible.  Delivery timely.

The food here is really good, especially for the price. The average roll price is much lower than anything else you would find in Buckhead/Brookhaven area. 

I recommend getting:
- Hot & Sour soup - there is a lot going on in this soup with a lot of flavor!
- Miso soup - GET THIS, the broth is amazing (insert drooling face)
- Caterpillar Roll - Avocado lover's dream for a roll (aka tons of avocado)
- Eel Roll with cucumber - great sauce on top
- Alaska roll - there is so much fish in here that it's completely worth the $11 for the roll. It's like a rainbow roll all in one bite!

GO GO GO!

This is the third time I have eaten here. I have been getting Thai for takeout which had been very good.  I got a sashimi plate for this visit. Excellent taste and great portions and great price. Back again tonight for a replay.

This is our favorite sushi spot in Buckhead. They are consistently busy and always deliver delicious, fresh and creative food. We've eaten at many different spots and this is the absolute best! If you're in the area give this place a try.

Found this hidden gem via uber eats...I was pleasantly surprised at how good the sushi was. I ordered the shrimp tempura reg roll, chicken tempura reg roll, the spicy tuna roll, and their lemon pepper chicken wings. The shrimp tempura was amazing!!! I can't get Over how good it was. The chicken tempura was just as tasty. The tuna roll was ok..6/10 alittle mushy for my taste. The chicken wings were burnt... I was very disappointed because the chicken had a great flavor smh. Overall I'd definitely order from here again, I can't wait to dine in!

photos.caption: Chicken Tempura Roll left, Shrimp Tempura Roll right! Both were sooo good! My favorite thing on the menu this far

comment.text:
Our go to.   Quick delivery thru grubhub. 
We've never had anything here we didn't like the only thing we'd like it to be better is there crab rangoon. 
The taste is good it's just their flat and not as puffy as one would like.

I have no idea what this jelly substance is in my food. I ordered steamed rice with broccoli stir fry and I am picking this jelly substance throughout my entire broccoli stirfry. I had to throw my meal away. I'm i'm not sure if it's cooked all the way or it's supposed to be reheated. But whatever sauce was used is disgusting to look at. Yes my food was steaming hot so I'm confused as to what I am supposed to do with this jelly content.

Nova offers up some great lunch options that are served up quickly. I met a work friend here for lunch during the weekday. Lunch specials come with a soup or house salad. I went for the salad which was OK. A lot more dressing that I typically find at such restaurants - which can be good or bad depending on your tastes. For my main meal, I ordered the beef teriyaki bento box. The roll was pretty good and the gyoza was fine. However, I did not enjoy the teriyaki sauce and I hated the rice. I had never seen such rice before. Way too dense and grainy for me. I ate as little of it as possible with my teriyaki. I would have much preferred white rice. I did try my friend's tempura veggies and they were pretty good. Let's just sum it up as she enjoyed her lunch much more than I enjoyed mine.
food was not good. Fried rice had no taste Nor Chicken wings. These are basic items. the service sucks too. I dont recommend & I would not go back

Ordered the "Beauty & the Beast" roll to-go, per the recommendation of the hostess. It was really good and they were extremely nice  also, the restaurant itself seemed clean and like a good, casual, dine-in location. Will definitely go back to try more of their rolls!

owner_replies.comment: Thank you very much for such great review! We work really hard to offer the best food in the best possible environment, so we are happy to see the reflected on your visit.

comment.text:
So so delicious. We ate here on 1/7/21. 

The services was attentive and so fast. I'm used to waiting a good while for good sushi, but these folks are a sushi making machine. We were expecting a long long meal, but afterwards we realized how quick it was and we were looking for something else to do to burn time before going home. We were not at all rushed at any point, they were just really efficient. 

Quality of the fish was outstanding. The super spider roll was delicious as were the salmon lovers and tuna lovers combos. So fresh and flavorful. And it was a lot of food! The roll was huge and the salmon and tuna sashimi and sushi pieces were double the size of other restaurants. We left incredibly full and very satisfied.

Excellent value for money. Sushi is more expensive than other cuisines. It just is. That said, the prices here given the quality and portion sizes was excellent.

This is now our go to sushi place in Buckhead. They run effective pick up business as well if you aren't dining out these days.

(All serving staff and chefs were wearing masks and there was hand sanitizer on every table.)
Just ordered pickup. Feel like it's gone downhill since the last time I ate their food.
LOVE THIS PLACE! Have been multiple times and the service is amazing and the food is amazing! I recommend their all of their sushi and lo mein!!

We ordered delivery via grub hub for $1.99 delivery fee. The salmon avocado roll, spicy tuna and shrimp tempura roll were all really really good! We also got miso soup (haven't had it yet we are stuffed!) and edamame (so good even our bulldog enjoyed it lol) The portions were great and the prices were very reasonable compared to other buckhead sushi bars. I 100% would order from Nova again! I have no complaints whatsoever!

Love this spot. I usually get the Spicy Crab Roll, Spicy Tuna Roll and their Black Pepper Steak. Their customer service here has always been great even during the pandemic.  

Recently, I gave their Curry Soup a try, it was okay, the noodles don't really go with it they could chop them up or give it a different noodle all together but the flavor was good. Overall no complaints here! Enjoy.
LOVE THE SUSHI HERE! My eyes went straight to the Volcano Roll and my babe ordered Teriyaki Chicken and rice. We both enjoyed our meals.

photos.caption: This was great!!! We ate all of the food before getting a photo. We ordered the Volcano Roll and Teriyaki chicken and rice .

comment.text:
Great sushi. Great quality. And what's even better? They actually looked at my grub hub notes and made my order exactly as asked.  No one ever does that!  They gave me more sauces than I asked for!  Great experience. If you're looking at ordering delivery and want some really great sushi (from a sushi snob) id definitely go here. 

Out of towners-

The food was really good, it came out quickly
and the atmosphere was very comforting. I ordered Spicy Garlic Edamame and the Tofu Mangolian Plate. It was delicious

owner_replies.comment:
Hi Jalina,
We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us this note. We values put customer satisfaction as top priority and we are committed to our customers. Its customers like you that make our restaurant more wonderful. We look forward to serving you again.

comment.text: I'm a true lover so sushi and can honestly eat it every day.  Sushi is refreshing and tasty when done right. The food here was amazing. Reasonably priced for a great lunch with your family or girls. I would definitely return here. The only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because I think the service was great but not the best and only because I think they were busy. Bathrooms were clean which is a huge plus for restaurants. Definitely a recommendation on my list.

This is hands down the best sushi in Buckhead/lenox area! It's consistently fresh with a great variety of sushi rolls as well as rice and noodle dishes. For it being fairly new, they've developed a good crowd and is consistently busy every single time I'm there to dine. They have a two roll special for lunch (pictured). The sushi Big Mac is a must try! You will not regret it!

owner_replies.comment:
We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us this note. We values put customer satisfaction as top priority and we are committed to our customers. Its customers like you that make our restaurant more wonderful. 
Hope to see you again!

comment.text: I've had the pleasure of traveling across the US coast to coast and have tried many sushi restaurants. This is by far one of my top two favorites Sushi restaurants!! Very impressed. Thank you guys. I will be back.

owner_replies.comment: Thank you for your kind words. It's always a pleasure to see you. We are looking forward to your next visit!

comment.text: This cozy sushi restaurant is tucked away in Buckhead across from Dicks sporting goods. The customer service is great and the the menu is full of great options. I tried the seaweed salad, spicy tuna roll and the panang curry, and every dishe delivered. I would recommend people at least put it on their try list!

This is by far the best sushi restaurant in America !!!   I love the sashimi here because it is only 14 something for lunch sashimi, and it is by far the freshest I have ever tasted.  The place is also very nicely decorated.  The staff are the most friendly people.  Not to mention there are sports channels to keep me entertained.  Located in the heart of Atlanta, the restaurant is never too far wherever I am.

The Japanese fusion restaurant turned out to be pretty good. I found out this place was open a few months ago. The menu has mostly Japanese food but they offer some Chinese and Thai foods too. There were 5 of us total that dined in, so we all ordered 2 appetizers, chef's special entree and 7 sushi rolls. I have to say, it's hard to eat everything because the plates are so big. The plates took so much space that we had to consolidate our food into different plates. Overall the food was good and the service great.

owner_replies.comment:
Thanks for the visit our restaurant. Glad to hear you like our staff and food! We are happy to see the reflected on your visit. 

Hope to see you again soon!

comment.text: Nice quiet place to grab lunch.  The location was not very busy when we arrived at lunchtime.  The orders came out quickly and the staff was extra friendly.  The food was very good.

photos.caption: Spicy Tuna, missing a few oops
Sizzling rice soup very good, probably best for two
Sushi Big Mac, I had to try it.  Very good flavor, recommend use a fork

comment.text: I've been eating sushi for almost 30 years. Without a doubt, this is the best sushi I've ever eaten. The service is great! The owner is also working as a sushi chef and will create unique sushi dishes for you if you desire. Everything we ate was excellent.

owner_replies.comment: Thanks, James! Here at Nova Sushi Bar, we care about making a match that lasts, and strive to be the best restaurant in Atlanta.

comment.text:
Great Sushi and Sashimi selection. The only problem
is they will try to kick you out if you are enjoying your company to long.

The food at Nova is amazing.  So filling and delicious.  You can taste the freshness in the sushi.  Our service was terrific, the price is right and the servings are perfect.

I highly recommend this restaurant.  Choices are endless.  Plenty of parking.

owner_replies.comment: Thanks for the awesome review, Donna! We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we're happy to hear we hit the mark for you. Come back and see us soon!
